            <tei-sourceDesc data-origname="sourceDesc">
                <tei-bibl data-origname="bibl">The Welte Mignon Studios offer you ...</tei-bibl>
                <tei-biblFull data-origname="biblFull">
                    <tei-titleStmt data-origname="titleStmt">
                        <tei-title level="m" type="main" data-origname="title" data-origatts="type level">The Welte Mignon Studios</tei-title>
                        <tei-title level="m" type="sub" data-origname="title" data-origatts="type level">Offer you exceptional opportunities</tei-title>
                        <tei-author data-origname="author">

                        </tei-author>

                    <tei-publicationStmt data-origname="publicationStmt">

                            <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">The Sun and New York Herald</tei-orgName>
                        </tei-publisher>
                        <tei-pubPlace ref="https://www.geonames.org/5128581" data-origname="pubPlace" data-origatts="ref">New York</tei-pubPlace>
                        <tei-date type="publication" data-origname="date" data-origatts="type">1920</tei-date>
                    </tei-publicationStmt>
                    <tei-seriesStmt data-origname="seriesStmt">
                        <tei-title level="j" type="main" data-origname="title" data-origatts="type level">The Sun and New York Herald</tei-title>
                        <tei-biblScope unit="issue" data-origname="biblScope" data-origatts="unit">Friday, April 30, 1920</tei-biblScope>

                    </tei-seriesStmt>
                </tei-biblFull>
            </tei-sourceDesc>

        <tei-profileDesc data-origname="profileDesc">
            <tei-langUsage data-origname="langUsage">
                <tei-language ident="eng" data-origname="language" data-origatts="ident">English</tei-language>
            </tei-langUsage>

            <tei-zone points="2381,1278 2381,1677 2381,1777 2902,1777 2902,1278" id="eSc_textblock_b3e47c4c" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="1637,2357 1637,2822 2873,2822 2873,2357" id="eSc_textblock_e007686d" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>

            <tei-zone points="1468,3073 1468,3179 1751,3179 1751,3073" id="eSc_textblock_3838333f" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>

            <tei-zone points="499,4102 499,4234 1889,4234 1889,4102" id="eSc_textblock_0eb08447" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="314,4255 314,4340 750,4340 750,4255" id="eSc_textblock_90b895ae" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2252,3691 2252,4350 3100,4350 3100,3691" id="eSc_textblock_d72e074e" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="1703,4243 1703,4331 2023,4331 2071,4331 2071,4243" id="eSc_textblock_332b9320" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="731,3672 731,3769 1653,3769 1653,3672" id="eSc_textblock_0f423e68" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="1472,4282 1472,4289 1465,4289 1467,4282" id="eSc_textblock_7021785f" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="270,588 270,1416 1628,1416 1628,588" id="eSc_textblock_7a8d435f" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="1638,1291 1638,1755 2168,1755 2369,1755 2369,1291" id="eSc_textblock_5618094e" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>

        </tei-surface>
    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_c5442680" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-hi rendition="#c" class="c" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-head data-origname="head">
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Welte Mignon Studios</tei-orgName>
                </tei-head>
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Offer you exceptional opportunities
            </tei-hi>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_a6014ae2" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-hi rendition="#u" class="u" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                The Master Himself
            </tei-hi>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_b536deda" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Not just mechanical playing of his compositions,<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>but <tei-seg ana="#virtual_presence" type="topic" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp type ana">his own fingers on your
            keyboard</tei-seg>.</tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_e56f4d74" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-hi rendition="#u" class="u" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-seg type="topic" ana="#touch_of_a_button" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp ana type">At Your Command</tei-seg>
            </tei-hi>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_2389efb5" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Accept as soon as you can our cordial invita-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>tion to spend a delightful hour or two with
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the masters of classic or popular music at our
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>beautiful studios. We shall gladly play your fav-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>orite selections. We shall place at your disposal the
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>services of a staff of musicians whose advice is al-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ways ready but is never intruded. We offer a re-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>markable collection of instruments at reasonable
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>prices and on exceptional terms.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_2cbb468e" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>If <tei-persName corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118986724" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp">Paderewski</tei-persName>
            played to you, on your own piano, ex-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>actly as he played at the very zenith of his career when
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>those marvelous fingers performed miracles, you could
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>count it a great event in your life. This is what the
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">WELTE MIGNON Reproducing Piano</tei-name> will do for you.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-persName corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118986724" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp">Paderewski</tei-persName>
            <tei-seg ana="#soulfulness" type="topic" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp type ana">
                played his soul into the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte</tei-name>
            </tei-seg>,
            <tei-seg ana="#immortality" type="topic" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp type ana">knowing<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>full well that thus could he better pass on
            to coming gen-<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>erations the perfect expression of his genius</tei-seg>. It is the
            <tei-seg ana="#soulfulness" type="topic" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp type ana">soul-<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>expression</tei-seg>
            that 
            <tei-seg ana="#listening" type="topic" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp type ana">
                you feel when you listen to the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte</tei-name>
            </tei-seg>;
            and<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#repeatability" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                you may hear it not only once, but
                as often as you wish.
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118986724" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Paderewski</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/124379923" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Lhevinne</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/11918625X" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Hofmann</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/116014490" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">de Pachman</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118518011" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Busoni</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/11875081X" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Saint-<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Saens</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118697641" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Grieg</tei-persName>,
            <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118501437" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">d'Albert</tei-persName>â156
            masters in all have
            <tei-seg ana="#personality" type="topic" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp type ana">
                played into the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte</tei-name>
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>for you the very essence of their musical
                personalities
            </tei-seg>,
            <tei-seg ana="#distinction_from_mechanical" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="ana">
                for <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte</tei-name> re-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>production is not "stencil cutting,"
            </tei-seg> but
            <tei-seg ana="#exact_reproduction" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                absolute tonal duplication.
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>There are over
            <tei-num type="cardinal" subtype="roll-count" value="5000" data-origname="num" data-origatts="value subtype type">
                5,000 record-rolls
            </tei-num> in the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte</tei-name> repertoire. Come
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>in to-day and hear your favorites.
            <tei-seg ana="#affordability" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                And bear in mind that the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte</tei-name>
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>is within your means, for it is sold on
                termsâyour own within reason.
            </tei-seg>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_80803b8a" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Our stock includes many examples of fine standard
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>makesâ
            <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte</tei-name>, <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Estey</tei-name>, <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Conway</tei-name>,
            and othersâshown in a
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>variety of case-designs and woods, giving you ample op-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>portunity to find the instrument that exactly suits your
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>taste and means. We sell all grades (except "cheap").
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>You can buy from us a really good instrument as low as
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-measure commodity="unspecified" unit="dollar" quantity="450" data-origname="measure" data-origatts="quantity unit commodity">
                $450
            </tei-measure>,
            on a series of monthly paymentsâterms, your own
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>within reason.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_b3e47c4c" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Pianos and
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Player-Pianos
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>at the Prices
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>You expect
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>to Pay
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_53814f97" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>WELTE TERMS</tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_e007686d" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>We maintain that if music is to be
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>enjoyed by everyone, it must be with
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>in everyone's reach. So we placed
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>every instrument in the <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Welte
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Mignon Studios</tei-orgName> just thereâwithin
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>EVERYONE'S means. Pick out any
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>instrument you like, from lowest to highest price, and buy
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>it on terms that are practically your own.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_cd6fbfd8" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>A wonderful showing of Phonographs
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_4ba7b7ec" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">VICTROLAS</tei-name>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_3c860cc6" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-gap reason="irrelevant" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="reason">
                <tei-desc data-origname="desc">
                    Advertises Victor products and models.
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-gap>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_c69c9e23" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-gap reason="irrelevant" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="reason">
                <tei-desc data-origname="desc">
                    Advertises Pathe products and models
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-gap>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_3838333f" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">PATHE</tei-name>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_86963cd3" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-gap reason="irrelevant" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="reason">
                <tei-desc data-origname="desc">
                    Advertises Victor Records and Pathe discs.
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-gap>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_17b7db97" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-hi rendition="#c" class="c" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-hi rendition="#u" class="u" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                    <tei-hi rendition="#i" class="i" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                        Can you drop in at once?
                    </tei-hi>
                </tei-hi>
            </tei-hi>

            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>No matter how many times you've visited the <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Studios</tei-orgName> before this,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>come in again; there's always something new to see and to hear. Re-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>member that you are never pressed to buyâjust come in as you would
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>visit a famous picture gallery. But if you cannot come today or to-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>morrow; at least, send this coupon by way of getting information on
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the latest instrument designs.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_d659d9d8" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>RECORDS</tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_0eb08447" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">The<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Welte Mignon Studios</tei-orgName>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_90b895ae" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-address data-origname="address">667 Fifth Avenue</tei-address>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_d72e074e" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">The Welte Mignon Studios</tei-orgName>,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-address data-origname="address">667 Fifth Ave., New York.</tei-address>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Without any obligation to me, send com-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>plete information on the items checked:
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Pianos
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Reproducing Pianos
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Player Pianos
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Victor</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Pathe</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Name
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Address
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Sun-Herald, 4-30.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_332b9320" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-address data-origname="address">At 53rd Street</tei-address>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_0f423e68" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs" data-empty=""/>
